Module com.example.pong_project
Package com.example.pong_project.Model

Class Racket

java.lang.Object
com.example.pong_project.Model.GameObject
com.example.pong_project.Model.Racket
public class Racket extends GameObject
the racket class is used to create the racket object. It extends the GameObject class.
